Config.IntroWindowText: Use the pencil tool to practice drawing facial features on the blank face. Look at the completed face for reference.

SlideData.SlideInstruction: Use the pencil tool to practice drawing facial features on the blank face. Look at the completed face for reference.

TextVersion: In your sketchbook, use a pencil to practice drawing the facial features you've learned about in this lesson. Try to draw eyes, a nose, and a mouth that are proportionate.
